;;;46       int i;
;;;47       if (Index < (unsigned)pThis->NumItems) {

00000a  d920              BLS      |L1.78|
;;;48         ha = pThis->haHandle;
00000c  f9b65002          LDRSH    r5,[r6,#2]
;;;49         if (ha) {
000010  2d00              CMP      r5,#0
000012  d01c              BEQ      |L1.78|
;;;50           int NumItems;
;;;51           WM_LOCK();

;;;52           pa = (WM_HMEM*) GUI_ALLOC_h2p(ha);
000018  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_h2p
00001e  4605              MOV      r5,r0
;;;53           /* Free the attached item */
;;;54           GUI_ALLOC_FreePtr(pa + Index);
000020  eb050044          ADD      r0,r5,r4,LSL #1
000024  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_FreePtr
;;;55           /* Move the last items to the position of the deleted item */
;;;56           NumItems = --pThis->NumItems;
000028  8830              LDRH     r0,[r6,#0]
00002a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00002c  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
00002e  8030              STRH     r0,[r6,#0]
;;;57           for (i = Index; i <= NumItems - 1; i++) {

000034  dc07              BGT      |L1.70|

;;;58             *(pa + i) = *(pa + i + 1);

;;;60           WM_UNLOCK();
